member.name: T:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Answer
member.summary: This object represents an answer containing all the provided data.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Answer.ChallengeId
member.summary: The unique identifier for the challenge you are providing an answer for.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Answer.Values
member.summary: The data you need to provide to solve the challenge question.

member.name: T:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Challenge
member.summary: This object represents a challenge for you to solve.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Challenge.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier for this started challenge. If you request a challenge multiple times, this identifier changes.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Challenge.Identifier
member.summary: The identifier for this challenge. If you request a challenge multiple times, it remains unchanged.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Challenge.Title
member.summary: The title for this challenge.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Challenge.Description
member.summary: The description for this challenge.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Challenge.Question
member.summary: The actual question for this challenge.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Challenge.Example
member.summary: An example containing sample question and answer.

member.name: T:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Example
member.summary: This object represents an example challenge for you to learn from.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Example.Question
member.summary: The example question that is applicable to a specific challenge.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Example.Answer
member.summary: The example answer that is applicable to a specific challenge and is calculated based on the example question.

member.name: T:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Overview
member.summary: This object represents a list of all challenge statusses for your team.

member.name: T:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Progress
member.summary: This object represents the status for a specific challenge. It also includes a link to the endpoint to GET and POST challenge data.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Progress.Status
member.summary: The status for this specific challenge.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Progress.Entry
member.summary: A link to the endpoint you should use to communicate with this challenge.

member.summary: This object represents a question containing all the needed data.

member.summary: The data you need to solve the challenge question.

member.name: T:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Response
member.summary: This object represents a unified response for all challenges you try to solve.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Response.Identifier
member.summary: The identifier for the challenge you have tried to solve.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Response.Status
member.summary: The status of the challenge you have tried to solve. Now you know if your attempt was successful or not.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Response.Identification
member.summary: Your personal identification relayed to you.

member.name: P:HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Response.Overview
member.summary: Your personal overview of all challenges.
